title: The Program: Sex slave training thriller with first time submission, exhibitionism and bondage.
description: Present day, Chicago: Brenda and Michael are part of something hideous and hostile. Brenda is tall, attractive and cunning. Michael is middle-aged, rich and gorgeous, who falls in in love with Jena, a young voluptuous first-time submissive turned masochist, who gets swept up in the middle of the group.  Unique to this genre, this is a thriller portraying a love triangle, interlaced with plot twists and drama. Savor this urban story with plenty of consensual BDSM sex, but intermingled with involuntary torture, illuminating a blossoming masochist.  First time BDSM experience entwined with intense physical and psychological torment, including exhibitionism, torture and betrayal. Not for the faint hearted.
author: Alexi Lutz
